abstract: Philadelphia Phillies trade pitcher Ben Lively to Cincinnati Reds for right fielder Marlon Byrd and cash.
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati acquired Byrd and cash from the Philadelphia Phillies for pitcher Ben Lively, the Reds’ minor league player of the year.
snippet: Cincinnati acquired Byrd and cash from the Philadelphia Phillies for pitcher Ben Lively, the Reds’ minor league player of the year.

headline.main: Phillies Send Marlon Byrd to Reds for Prospect
headline.print_headline: Phillies Trade Byrd to the Reds
